class="text-description"> Shopping First For Coupon $25 Receive And... </div> {{block class="Magento\Newsletter\Block\Subscribe" template="Magento_Newsletter::subscribe-footer.phtml"}} </div> </div> </div> <div class="container"> <div class="row footer-middle1"> <div class="col-lg-4 col-sm-12 col-12"> <div class="ft-block"> <div class="footer-logo"> <img src="{{media Company</div> <div class="ft-content"> <ul class="links-footer"> <li><a href="{{store url=""}}best-sellers">Delivery</a></li> <li><a href="{{store url=""}}privacy-policy-cookie-restriction-mode">Legal Notice</a></li> <li><a href="{{store url=""}}about-us">About Us</a></li> <li><a href="{{store url=""}}enable-cookies">Secure Payment</a></li> <li><a href="{{store url=""}}faqs">FAQs</a></li> </ul> class="intro-text">Save $3 with app &<br /> new user only</div> <div class="google-play"><a href="#"><img src="{{media url=wysiwyg/footer/google-play.png}}" alt="Google Play" /></a></div> <div Cards</a> / <a href="#">22 GB Memory Cards</a> / <a href="#">16 GB Memory Cards</a> </span> </li> </ul> </div> <div class="col-lg-4 col-sm-12 col-12"> <div class="ft-block"> <div
